definition: traffic jam
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to hinder/to block/to obstruct
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
strategic pass/tactical border position
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Why is the government to charge car-owners who cause the pollution and traffic jams?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼政府要對那些造成污染和交通阻塞的車主收費？

sentences.english: At least they don't cause pollution or traffic jams.
sentences.chinese: 至少它們不會造成污染或者交通阻塞。

sentences.english: As a result of traffic jam, he arrived late at the station.
sentences.chinese: 由於交通阻塞，他到達車站時已晚了。

sentences.english: Roadworks are causing bottlenecks in the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 道路施工導致市中心交通阻塞。

sentences.english: The road to the downtown is clogged with traffic.
sentences.chinese: 去市中心的路交通阻塞得厲害。

sentences.english: If there aren’t any holdups, I think we can get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 如果路上沒什麼交通阻塞的話，我想我們能趕得上。

sentences.english: The problem for traffic jam and malfunction cois is solved by the colorful road surface.
sentences.chinese: 彩色路面能很好地解決交通安全和交通阻塞問題。

sentences.english: I think we can get there on time if there are no hold-ups.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們能按時趕到，如果沒有交通阻塞的話。

sentences.english: But they don't cause pollution or traffic jams.
sentences.chinese: 但是自行車並不引起污染或者交通阻塞。

sentences.english: Because of bad traffic, we missed our plane.
sentences.chinese: 由於交通阻塞，我們誤了飛機。

sentences.english: I can get you there in 15 minutes, traffic or no traffic.
sentences.chinese: 我15分鐘之內包管把你送到，不管交通阻塞不阻塞。

sentences.english: But Beijingers are used to epic-scale gridlock.
sentences.chinese: 但是北京人對這種規模巨大的交通阻塞早已習以爲常。

sentences.english: Don't cut anyone off in traffic, it's illegal.
sentences.chinese: 別在交通阻塞時並道，那是非法的。

sentences.english: We drive across town, run into traffic, and arrive late to a meeting.
sentences.chinese: 在市裏開車卻遇到了交通阻塞，致使開會遲到了。

sentences.english: I think youll make it if we dont gets Tuck in a traffic jam.
sentences.chinese: 我想，如果我們不碰上交通阻塞，你是可以趕到的。

sentences.english: Maybe he in the traffic jam.
sentences.chinese: 他可能遇上交通阻塞了。
